title: 1887 N28 R.L. Caruthers Topps Buyback Card F/S
author: Archive

posts.post_title: 1887 N28 R.L. Caruthers Topps Buyback Card F/S
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Shawn St Clair
1887 N28 Allen and Ginter R.L. Caruthers Topps Buyback Card.  Topps purchased a few of the originals to be inserted in the last couple years of their Allen and Ginter current issues.  Great looking front but back has writing and paper loss.  Asking $275.  Paypal add 3%.

Thanks.
